change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Carbon reporters' transcript of proceedings, District Court, State of Arizona. Phelps Dodge Corporation, plaintiff, vs. Frank Luke, et al., defendants, Equity No. 222, Nov. 5-15, 1935. Case concerning dispute over assessed valuations of property for copper company property taxes. Accompanied by partial index.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Reporters' Transcript of Proceedings (AZ 221). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired as gift of William R. Mathews, 1937.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in order of proceedings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Carbon reporters' transcript of proceedings, District Court, State of Arizona. Phelps Dodge Corporation, plaintiff, vs. Frank Luke, et al., defendants, Equity No. 222, Nov. 5-15, 1935. Case concerning dispute over assessed valuations of property for copper company property taxes. Accompanied by partial index.
